Key Match Events: Zach Edey ended the first quarter with two points, four rebounds, and altered multiple shots around the rim.
Edey ended the first half with six points and five rebounds.
Edey made a 3-pointer on Saturday against the Orlando Magic but missed both attempts against the Bulls.
The Chicago Bulls, which trailed 68-54 at halftime, cut the deficit to 100-93 before the fourth quarter started.
Post-Match Reflections: Zach Edey has been a non-factor for the Memphis Grizzlies in the second half this season.
Edey hasn't gained Jenkins' trust yet, particularly when games get tight in the second half.
